plot: Catherina and Erik Bovenkerk are happily married. But then they decide to take care of father Piet Bovenkerk and he moves in.
plot_en: Catherina and Erik Bovenkerk are happily married. But then they decide to take care of father Piet Bovenkerk and he moves in.
plot_es: Catherina and Erik Bovenkerk are happily married. But then they decide to take care of father Piet Bovenkerk and he moves in.
title: 't Zonnetje in huis
